DataElement.preferredDefinition: A set of actions and observations, performed to verify or falsify a hypothesis or research a causal relationship between phenomena._The determination of the amount of a particular constituent of a mixture or of the biological or pharmacological potency of a drug.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities._Specifies the biological information reported by a microarray.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A set of actions and observations, performed to verify or falsify a hypothesis or research a causal relationship between phenomena._The determination of the amount of a particular constituent of a mixture or of the biological or pharmacological potency of a drug.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A set of actions and observations, performed to verify or falsify a hypothesis or research a causal relationship between phenomena.

Concepts.definition: A coordinated set of actions and observations designed to generate data, with the ultimate goal of discovery or hypothesis testing.

Property.preferredDefinition: The determination of the amount of a particular constituent of a mixture or of the biological or pharmacological potency of a drug.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

Concepts.definition: A qualitative or quantitative analysis performed to determine the amount of a particular constituent in a sample or the biological or pharmacological properties of a drug.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released workflow status per 7/13/09 request of VCDE following successful Silver Compatibility review.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Specifies the biological information reported by a microarray.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A variation of a single nucleotide at a specific location of the genome due to base substitution, present at an appreciable frequency between individuals of a single interbreeding population.

Concepts.definition: A variation of a single nucleotide at a specific location of the genome due to base substitution, present at an appreciable frequency between individuals of a single interbreeding population.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The sequences of a gene that are present in the final, mature, spliced messenger RNA molecule from that gene.

Concepts.definition: The sequences of a gene that are present in the final, mature, spliced messenger RNA molecule from that gene.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Typically involves transcription of genetically encoded information into an intermediary message (messenger RNA) and subsequent translation into a functional protein.

Concepts.definition: Typically involves transcription of genetically encoded information into an intermediary message (messenger RNA) and subsequent translation into a functional protein.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An organizational header for concepts representing mostly abstract entities.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Released workflow status per 7/13/09 request of VCDE following successful Silver Compatibility review.
